text: a cottage half - way between this village and yonder shoulder of the Downs up there
yonder shoulder of the Downs up there
the wide ocean - bosom of the Downs
women far out of sight arid hearing
the affable gentry and interested parsons of the country round about
the shepherd , who for some nights past had been disturbed and preoccupied
the Giant with no Heart in his Body
anyone to change the news with
the bare and willowy leagues of Downs
The dragon , on hearing the approaching footsteps
a very nice old gentleman up here
an enemy of the human race
The most modest and retiring dragon in the world
a friend of his own age in the crowd
a great big fellow like you
a hero at heart or not
an adversary worthy of my steel , and no feeble specimen of his noxious tribe
a fellow who sticks up for his friends , and I ’m sure the dragon has his good points , if he ’s got a friend like you
the biggest story - tellers in all the country round
a poor innocent badger in the stable behind here
a beautiful place for a fight
even those who had put their money on him
boys who had escaped from parental control and now sprawled and rolled about on the grass , regardless of the shrill threats and warnings discharged at them by their anxious mothers behind
a stage - manager on a first night
the grim mouth of the cave
that old fool of a dragon
the Saint , who had lost a stirrup
a combatant who could hold his own so well and clearly wanted to show good sport
the Saint ’s end of the line
St George , who had come out for a stroll in the cool night - air
this great lumbering pig of a dragon
